entry_atmosphere.description: Generate atmospheric text for entering a dungeon with your party
entry_atmosphere.prompt_template:
You and your adventuring party ({party_summary}) are standing at the entrance to a mysterious dungeon. Write 1-2 sentences of atmospheric text describing the entrance and setting the mood for adventure. Make it immersive and exciting, but not overly dramatic.

Response:

random_location.prompt_template:
Generate a mysterious dungeon location for exploration. 

Respond with valid JSON in this exact format:
{{"name": "Location Name", "description": " 1-2 sentence description of what you see, hear, and feel in this location. Make it atmospheric and immersive."}}

door_choices.description: Generate 2 mysterious door choices for dungeon exploration
door_choices.prompt_template:
Generate 2 mysterious locations for exploration. 

Respond with valid JSON in this exact format:
{{"door1": {{"name": "Door Name", "description": "1-2 sentence description of the location that this door leads to."}}, "door2": {{"name": "Door Name", "description": "1-2 sentence description of the location that this door leads to."}}}}

location_event.description: Generate event text for exploring a specific location
location_event.prompt_template:
You and your party have entered {location_name} in a dungeon. Write 1-2 sentences describing what happens when you explore this area. Make it atmospheric and interesting, focusing on discovery and exploration rather than danger. Describe what you find, see, or experience.

exit_narrative.prompt_template:
You and your adventuring party ({party_summary}) are successfully exiting a dungeon adventure and returning to safety.
